name: Clones Game Jam
description:
=================================

INCOMPLETE GAME JAM GAME

NOT IN ACTIVE PRODUCTION

================================= 

Created for Weekly Game Jam #202 "Clones" using Unity's High Definition Render Pipeline.

You crash land on an unknown planet to find the cloning machine you use to reconstitute your crew has been tampered with. Aliens have accessed the controls and has let loose an unending army of clones! Fight your way through them and destroy the generators powering the cloning machine.

Controls:
Movement -> WASD/Arrows
Aiming/Move Crosshair -> Mouse
Fire Weapon -> Left Mouse
Swap between Kill and Stun -> Right Mouse (Stun is not fully implemented)

Implemented:
NavMeshAgent enemies with a baked NavMesh so enemies can find routes to the player.
Cinemachine dolly/cart camera to smoothly move along the X-axis for side-scroller feel.
Physics-based projectiles pooled to save on instantiation/destruction.
Material emission effects to make the shots and generators look alive with lighting.
Smoke effect on the ship utilizing Unity's Visual Effects Graph.

Assets:
Space Kit by Kenney
